title: Cinque Terre Collection Research Configuration
description: Research prompts and settings for automated collection data gathering

restaurants.search_prompt: Research restaurants in Cinque Terre villages (Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza, Monterosso). Focus on authentic local trattorias, seafood restaurants, wine bars, and family-run establishments. Include both popular tourist spots and hidden local favorites.
default_queries: best restaurants Manarola Cinque Terre TripAdvisor
Cinque Terre authentic local restaurants not touristy
seafood restaurants Cinque Terre fresh catch

extraction_hints.name: Official restaurant name
extraction_hints.village: Must be one of: Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza, Monterosso
extraction_hints.details.cuisine_type: Array: Italian, Seafood, Ligurian, Mediterranean, etc.
extraction_hints.menu.specialties: Signature dishes: pesto, anchovies, focaccia, etc.
extraction_hints.tips: Insider tips: best tables, reservation needed, what to order

accommodations.search_prompt: Research accommodations in Cinque Terre villages. Include hotels, B&Bs, apartments, guesthouses, and agriturismi. Focus on properties with sea views, historic character, or unique locations. Note accessibility (stairs) and proximity to train stations.

extraction_hints.name: Official property name
extraction_hints.type.category: Hotel, B&B, Apartment, Guesthouse, Hostel, Villa, Room Rental
extraction_hints.type.property_class: Luxury, Boutique, Mid-Range, Budget, Vacation Rental
extraction_hints.tips: Insider info: best rooms, noise levels, stairs count

hikes.search_prompt: Research hiking trails in Cinque Terre National Park. Include the famous Sentiero Azzurro (Blue Trail) segments, sanctuary trails, and high-altitude routes. Check current trail status (open/closed), difficulty, duration, and fees (Cinque Terre Card requirements).
default_queries: Cinque Terre hiking trails open 2024 status
Sentiero Azzurro Blue Trail Cinque Terre conditions
Via dell'Amore path Riomaggiore Manarola status
Cinque Terre sanctuary trails Madonna di Soviore
high route Cinque Terre SVA trail
Cinque Terre Card hiking pass fee 2024
best viewpoints Cinque Terre hiking trails

extraction_hints.name: Trail name (official and common names)
extraction_hints.trail_number: CAI trail number if applicable (e.g., SVA, 531)
extraction_hints.category.primary: Coastal Path, Mountain Trail, Sanctuary Trail, Village Connection, Ridge Walk
extraction_hints.access_and_fees.cinque_terre_card_valid: Whether Cinque Terre Card is required/valid

pois.search_prompt: Research points of interest in Cinque Terre villages. Include churches, viewpoints, historic sites, beaches, harbors, and landmarks. Note opening hours, entrance fees, and best times to visit.
default_queries: Cinque Terre churches San Giovanni Battista
swimming spots Cinque Terre rocks beaches

extraction_hints.name: POI name (official and common)
extraction_hints.category: Church, Monument, Viewpoint, Beach, Historic Site, Harbor, Tower
extraction_hints.village: Which village it's in or nearest to
extraction_hints.tips: Photography tips, crowd avoidance, hidden gems

events.search_prompt: Research annual events and festivals in Cinque Terre. Include religious festivals (patron saint days), food festivals, wine harvests, and cultural events. Note dates, locations, and what to expect.
default_queries: patron saint festivals Cinque Terre villages
Sciacchetrà wine harvest festival Cinque Terre

extraction_hints.name: Event/festival name
extraction_hints.village: Which village hosts it (or 'region' for multi-village)
extraction_hints.category: Festival, Religious, Cultural, Food & Wine, Music
extraction_hints.tips: Accommodation booking, crowd levels, what to bring

research_schedule.description: Recommended refresh intervals for collection data

hikes.notes: Trail conditions change frequently, especially after storms

events.notes: Confirm dates 1-2 months before each event

freshness_requirements.restaurants: Data should be less than 3 months old
freshness_requirements.hikes: Trail status should be verified within 1 week
freshness_requirements.events: Dates should be confirmed for current/next year

general: Always verify data from multiple sources when possible
Include source URLs for all data points
Note last_updated timestamp for time-sensitive info
Flag any inconsistencies found between sources
Prioritize official sources (park website, municipal sites) for factual data
Use TripAdvisor/Google for ratings and reviews

village_specific.Riomaggiore: The easternmost village, known for dramatic cliffs and colorful houses
village_specific.Manarola: Famous for wine terraces and the Christmas nativity lights
village_specific.Corniglia: Only village not at sea level - 382 steps from station
village_specific.Vernazza: Natural harbor, considered most picturesque, Doria Castle
village_specific.Monterosso: Largest village with sandy beaches, split into old and new town
